content: Hey, I finally published another testing-related micro-crate, arbtest: https://github.com/matklad/arbtest. IIRC, we have something very hand-written for testing CFGs, we might want to use arbtest instead.
I like your random number generator in there

no one was fired for copy-pasting code from core

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/d00e77078c0bd003323af67b4deb27627226d2e6/library/core/src/slice/sort.rs#L605-L612
